Ahoy!
Im reading how you guys want the project to grow and that seems awesome!

Author: blackbeard#8888
Content:
*[Anne Bonny ( @radix42 ), sleeps deeply as if under hypnotic trance as the waves cascade gently against the splintered sides of the old Spanish Galleon.
Blackbeard suddenly appears over the main deck, gazing starkly into the night sky. A warm blush compliments his tar stained face. 
His unkempt appearance fades beneath the radiance and splendor of his posture.
The crew look up, some compelled to raise to their feet ... and as Blackbeard clears his throat ... not only the crew ... but it seems the ocean itself falls silent in anticipation of hearing his raspy words]*

Author: blackbeard#8888
Content:
@radix42  me foyn lass, I tink ye be sleepin' in yer 'ammock 'n ye be fergivn me if'n ey'd be carlin ye Annie. *[alludes to Anne Bonny]* 
Eye shore'd loyd ta rekindle 'em escapades wen ye, Jack 'n Mary pilfered te sloop William fr'm Nassau. Haharrrgh ... be them thar glory days!
twasn't fur me 'ed bein' separated fr'm me neck, we'd've made a foyn cupal ta be sure *wink wink* aye.
Enuf wit pleasantrees 'n thank Davy Jones ye been resurected along wit meself ta farce wind inta 'em thar sails 'gainst a bleedin' tide unscrupulous gobberment wastrels. 
Ye bit I digress, fergive 'em me lady, dis 'ere crew mayhaps be sumwut cavalier, bit we be o' tymes witch declare 'istoric fortitude. 'n thut bein' so, we's git a ton a romanticisin'n aptitudinal traysure ta lyved.
Thus wut, I beg ye ta accept this token o' ma appreciation ... ye be wun 'o two lass'nettes that mus' shorely belong 'ere 'pon this vassal, te 'Good Ship ARRR'
On behalf o' this ere crew Welcome aboard me lady!

*[Instructs crew to "... breakout a fresh'nest barrel o' ta finest Rum"]*
**"Ta Tortuga Lads!"**
